events.message: I recently received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized as a Refund issue based on the customer's request for money back due to receiving the wrong product.
The case has been assigned to support agent Emily Johnson for further handling of the refund request.
Hello, I’m Emily from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item and I’m here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received to process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 4589213 and I have attached a photo showing that I received the wrong jacket size.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
That’s great to hear, thank you for the quick response and helpful service with my refund.
The refund has been processed on our end and you should see the amount reflected in your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Since the refund was confirmed received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now.
